languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля шипит с некоторым удивлением:{/n} "Употребление в пищу плоти членов {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} не рекомендовано вне зависимости от их запаха и скомпрометированности".

{n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля шипит с некоторым удивлением:{/n} "Употребление в пищу плоти членов {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} не рекомендовано вне зависимости от их запаха и скомпрометированности".

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが驚きを隠せない様子で唸る。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のメンバーの肉を食べることは、その臭いや危険な状態に関係なく、お勧めできません」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが驚きを隠せない様子で唸る。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のメンバーの肉を食べることは、その臭いや危険な状態に関係なく、お勧めできません」

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal laisse échapper un sifflement surpris :{/n}« La consommation de la chair des membres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} est déconseillée, peu importe son odeur ou son état de dégradation. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal laisse échapper un sifflement surpris :{/n}« La consommation de la chair des membres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} est déconseillée, peu importe son odeur ou son état de dégradation. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中发出了惊讶的嘶嘶声。{/n}“不建议食用{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}成员的血肉，无论其气味或受损状态如何。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中发出了惊讶的嘶嘶声。{/n}“不建议食用{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}成员的血肉，无论其气味或受损状态如何。”

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal sisea con cierto atisbo de sorpresa:{/n} «No se recomienda la ingesta de carne de miembros del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, independientemente de su olor o condiciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal sisea con cierto atisbo de sorpresa:{/n} «No se recomienda la ingesta de carne de miembros del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, independientemente de su olor o condiciones».

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox zischt in überraschtem Ton auf:{/n} "Der Verzehr des Fleischs von Mitgliedern des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} wird nicht empfohlen, unabhängig vom Geruch oder Zustand."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox zischt in überraschtem Ton auf:{/n} "Der Verzehr des Fleischs von Mitgliedern des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} wird nicht empfohlen, unabhängig vom Geruch oder Zustand."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, şaşırtı emaresi ile tıslıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} mensuplarının etinin, kokusu veya durumuna bakılmaksızın tüketilmesi önerilmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses with a hint of surprise,{/n} "Consumption of the flesh of members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} is not recommended, irrespective of their smell or compromised state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, şaşırtı emaresi ile tıslıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} üyeleri etinin, kokusu veya durumuna bakılmaksızın, tüketilmesi önerilmez."
